title: Governance Policy Schema
description: Defines the valid structure for a governance_policy.yaml file.

default_action.description: The action to take if no rules match a signal.

rules.description: A list of rules to evaluate in order.

name.description: A human-readable name for the rule.

conditions.description: A set of conditions that must all be met for the rule to match.

decision.description: The decision to render if the conditions match.
